results.name: Permutation of nonnegative integers: a(n) = A006068(A057300(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16383
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: A006068(n)= { my(s=1, ns); while(1, ns = n >> s; if(0==ns, break()); n = bitxor(n, ns); s <<= 1; ); return (n); } \\ From A006068
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 15 2018
